products.name: terraform-ibm-icd-redis
products.label: ICD Redis Module
products.short_description: Implements an instance of IBM Cloud Databases for Redis.
products.long_description: Use this module to provision and configure an IBM Cloud Database for Redis instance.

features.title: Create Redis instance
features.description: Create IBM Cloud Database for Redis instance.

features.title: Attach Users
features.description: Attach list of users to the Redis instance.

features.title: Auto Scaling instance
features.description: Rules to allow the Redis database instance to increase resources in response to usage.

features.title: Create Service Credentials Roles
features.description: Create Service Credentials Roles for the ICD Redis database instance.

features.title: KMS encryption
features.description: Supports key management encryption (BYOK and KYOK), including service-to-service authorization policies with KMS.

features.title: CBR
features.description: Create context-based restriction (CBR) rules for both instance and buckets.

flavors.label: Complete example with BYOK encryption, and CBR rules
flavors.name: complete

flavors.label: IBM Cloud Framework for Financial Services compliant
flavors.name: fscloud
